كـ جانغو 😾 أنت الآن قرصان في هذا الوقت. لكن ان اختارت البحرية أسرك وإعدامك، سوف تناشدهم ليسمحوا لك بالإنضمام لهم كجندي من البحرية (وبالطبع، ستنومهم مغناطيسيًا كي لتجعلهم يوافقوا). تحتاج المساعدة؟ > /aboutCursed

أنت أعظم سايبورغ في العالم، فراااانكي🕵. أثناء اليوم، يمكنك استعمال نظارتك التجسسية الخاااااارقة لكشف أدوارهم. على أي حال - بفعل ذلك، من المحتمل أن يكشف دورك للبحرية! (بنسبة 40%). تحتاج المساعدة؟ > /aboutDetective
كـ ملك الروح، العظمي بروك 🍻، أنت تعرض حرفيًا قلبك وروحك لمجتمع القراصنة! (وحقًا، الجميع يعلم بذلك...). تحتاج المساعدة؟ > /aboutDrunk
أنت طبيب السفينة الوحيد، تشوبر 👼. كل ليلة، يمكنك اختيار لاعب لإنقاذ حياته. ومع ذلك، اذا اخترت إنقاذ البحرية، هناك احتمال بنسبة 50% أنهم سيأسرونك ويعدمونك. تحتاج المساعدة؟ > /aboutGA

أنت سيد القناصين، سوغيكينغ (يوسوب) 🔫. لديك أفضل كابوتو (مقلاع) على الإطلاق، لكن لديك طلقتين فقط يمكنك استخدامها للقضاء على عدو. أثناء اليوم، يمكنك إطلاق النار على لاعب آخر. الجميع سيسمع الطلقة، ويعلم أنك الإسطوري سوغيكينغ (وليس من البحرية). تحتاج المساعدة؟ > /aboutGunner

نامي 💋، أيتها القطة السارقة! أنت اللصة المخادعة، ودائما ما تملأين جيوبك بالسرقة من رفاقكِ القراصنة. أثناء الليل، يمكنك زيارة سفينة قرصان آخر، لمحاولة سرقة كنوزهم (ولتؤكدي أنهم ليسوا من البحرية) لكن إن زُرتِ أحد البحرية، أو شخصًا تأسره البخرية، فسيتم أسركِ أيضًا. لكن برغم ذلك إن ذهبت للسرقة، وحاولت البخرية أسركِ في سفينتك، فستنجين. تحتاج مساعدة؟ > /aboutHarlot

حاليًا، ك شيتشيبوكاي 🖕، أ قرصان، لمن عندما يباد جميع جنود البحرية، فستصبح جندي من البحرية، وستحاول القضاء على رفاقك القراصنة. إذا قامت العرافة المتلصصة (روبن) بالتلصص عليك، فربما تتعرف عليك على أنك من البحرية. تحتاج مساعدة؟ > /aboutTraitor
أنت جندي من البحرية 🐺!! مبغضي القراصنة. العدالة (絶対的正義) يجب أن تطبق! إختر أي قرصان لتأسره كل ليلة! تحتاج مساعدة؟ > /aboutWW
أنت روبن 👳، مستخدمة فاكهة زهرة-زهرة. كل ليلة، يمكنك تنفيذ أوجوس فلور على أي قرصان لتكشف هويته الحقيقية. تحتاج مساعدة؟ > /aboutSeer
أنت قرصانٌ تافه بلا إسم 👱، مكتوب عليك قضاء حياتك تنظف سطح السفينة والقيام بالأعمال الوضيعة لقبطان سفينتك. تحتاج مساعدة؟ > لا مساعدة لأجلك

أنت شيراهوشي 👺، البوسيدون. إن تم إطعامك لخزانة دايفي جونز، فستفوز تلقائيًا! لا أحد يجرؤ على رمي بوسيدون لدايفي جونز، داه! حيث ستقوم ملوك البحر بإبادة البحار الأربعة والخط العظيم والخط الأحمر. تحتاج مساعدة؟ > /aboutTanner
كوبي المسكين 👶,ط، تم اختطافك من قبل قرصان!!! اوه كلا! عندما يأسر القرصان الذي اختطفك أو يقتل. فستنضم للبحرية وتقسم على تقديم كل أولئك القراصنة الملاعين للعدالة! تحتاج مساعدة؟ > /aboutWC

أنت سانجي 👁، الطباخ المنحرف -- سوف تراقب باستمرار محبوبتك، والذي يصادف أنها روبن. سيتم إخبارك من هي روبن (الحقيقية) - هذه وظيفتك الوحيدة. الأنر منوط لك بكيف ستحمي محبوبتك من رفاقك القراصنة والبحرية. تحتاج مساعدة؟ > /aboutBH
أنت فيفي 🙇، العرافة المتدربة، بديلة روبن (الحقيقية). إذا ماتت روبن (الحقيقية)، فستتمكني من أكل فاكهة زهرة-زهرة وتكتسبين مهارة اوجوس فلور. تحتاج مساعدة؟ > /aboutAppS

أنت من فريق اليونكو العظيم 👤. كل ليلة، يمكنك إختيار لاعب لكي تغسل دماغه لينضم لفريق اليونكو. إذا كان جميع اللاعبين الأحياء المتبقين في النهاية جزءٌ من فريق اليونكو، فستفوز. تحتاج مساعدة؟ د > /aboutCult

أنت ملك القراصنة المستقبلي خاصتنا مونكي دي لوفي 💂، تحاول القضاء على كل قرصان من فريق اليونكو كي تمنعهم من غسل دماغ الآخرين! كل ليلة، إختر لاعبًا. إن كان من فريق اليونكو فسيموت. إن حاول فريق اليونكو غسل دماغك، أحدث عضو في الفريق سيموت من من عضب ضربتك غومو غمو نو كونغ غان. تحتاج مساعدة؟ > /aboutCH

Your role is simple - try to survive. Each day, you will have a chance to sacrifice the marines to Davy Jones Locker.

You are the Sneaky Seer. In this role, each night, you may choose a player, and have their role revealed to you. Admit to your role wisely: If you reveal you are the sneaky seer, the marines will try to capture you!

You get to have fun! Each day, you will attempt to decieve your fellow players. However, each night, you will get to pick a player to kill! Note:if you attack the drunk, you yourself will become drunk, and will be unable to attack the next night as you sleep off your hangover! If you attack the cursed, they will become a wolf like yourself! Hooray friends!

As the harlot (you slut...) you will be given the chance to 'visit' another player each night. If they are not the wolf, you will be told so (because you live!). If you visit a wolf, you will be killed. If you visit the player the wolves have chosen to kill, you will be killed as well. However - If you are visiting a player, and the wolves choose to kill you, you will survive (you weren't home)
You drunken bastard! As the drunk, you are still just a villager. BUT! If the wolves kill you, they will become disabled for the next night, as they are drunk off your insanely high BAC.
As the cursed, you are a normal villager... until the wolves kill you. Once they do, you will become a wolf as well! Free to hunt in the night..... XD
You are a traitorous bastard. If you survive long enough for all the wolves to die, you will become a werewolf, ready to kill your former teammates in the night!
You are the Guardian Angel! Each night, you may choose a player to watch over. Be careful however - if you choose to watch over a wolf, there is a 50% chance you will be killed.
You old sleuth. Each day, you will have the chance to investigate another player. Use this carefully however, for these is a 40% chance the werewolves will detect you!

A bit trigger happy are we? As the gunner, you are given 2 silver bullets at the beginning of the game. Each day, you will have the chance to shoot another player. Once you do, everyone will know you are the gunner! Be careful though, you only have 2 bullets!
The Tanners goal is simple: Get Lynched. If the Tanner gets lynched, he wins, period. Everyone else loses.
he fool is told they are the seer.... when they choose to see someone's role at night, they are told a random role.
As a cultist, it is your goal to convert all other players (except wolves) to your cult. If at the end of the game, all living players are cultist - the cult wins
Your job is to hunt the Cult. If the cult attacks you, their newest member will die. Each night you may pick a player to 'hunt' - if they are a cultist, they will die.
At the beginning of the game, you will choose someone to be your 'role model'. If they die, you become a werewolf.
For now, you are a normal villager. However, if the seer dies, you will become the new seer
You will be told who the seer is (the real one, not the fool)
A mason's job is simple - they automatically know who the other masons are. Otherwise, they are a simple villager.

Your ancestors had the ability to metamorph into others... while you don't have their full abilities, you can pick a player at the start of the game. If that player dies, you will become what they were. Note: If the player was converted to cult, you will take on their original role. All other normal rules apply: If they were Wild Child and their role model died, you will become a wolf. Otherwise, you will inherit their role model. The cult cannot convert the Doppelgänger (but can after the doppelganger switches roles). Also - the Doppelgänger can NOT win unless they have transformed. If at the end of the game, the Doppelgänger is still the same, they lose (exception: lover)

Love is in the air. As Cupid, you will choose two players at the start of the game. These two players will become madly in love! If one of them dies, the other will die of sorrow :( Note: Lovers will know who each other are, but not be told their roles. If the lovers are the last two alive, they win, regardless of teams. If the lovers are on different teams (villager + wolf), and one team wins (wolf), the lover (villager) wins as well. TL;DR if both lovers are alive at the end, and at least one of them was on the winning team, they both win together

A trigger happy, vindictive player. As the hunter, you try to keep to yourself. However, when others come to visit you, they may find themselves dead, as your paranoia takes hold and you shoot. If the wolves attack you, you have a chance to take one of them with you. Otherwise, if you die, you will get a chance to shoot someone as you die. Note: For wolf attacks, the chance starts at 30%. If there is one wolf, the hunter has a 30% chance to kill the wolf (and survive). For each additional wolf, add 20% (2 wolves = 50%, 3 = 70%, etc). However - if there are multiple wolves, while you may kill one of them, you will still be outnumbered and killed. If the cult tries to convert you, they have a 50% chance to fail. If they fail, you have a 50% chance to kill one of them!

That asylum was silly anyways. What a joke. You are free now however, back to business as usual - killing! The serial killer is a lone player, on their own team. They can win only if they are the last player alive (exception: lovers). As the serial killer, you can kill ANYONE - wolves, hunters, gunners, guardian angels, whatever. If the wolves try to attack you, you will kill one of them (random), and live.
Para is a silly developer that likes to bark at people. Maybe he's been messing with marines too long....Messing with marines is a very bad idea.

أنت العمدة🏅. تصويتك أثناء الإعدام سيحسب كتصويتين، بعد أن تكشف عن هويتك. أنت في فريق القرويين.
أنت الأمير 👑 متخفي، هربت من حياة الدلال المملة لتقضي أيامك مع هؤلاء الفلاحين. إن حاولوا إعدامك فسيدركوا خطأهم، ولن يتم إعدام أي أحد.
أنت الأخرق 🤕: عندما تحاول التصويت سيكون هناك إحتمال بنسبة 50% أنك ستصوت لشخصٍ غير الذي قصدته. برغم ذلك أنت ما تزال في فريق القرويين.
أنت الساحر 🔮، تتحالف مع مخلوقات الليل بدلًا من القرويين. خلال الليل ستستعمل قوتك لتعثر على الذئاب والعراف. تفوز فقط إذا فازت الذئاب. لذلك فلتستمتع بالمساعدة في القضاء على هؤلاء القرويين البائسين.
أنت الحداد ⚒: صانع المعادن في القرية. لديك كميةٌ قليلة من الفضة، كافيةً لتمنع الذئاب نن الهجوم لليلةٍ واحدة. أثناء النهار، يمكن أن تختار نثرها ونشرها في أنحاء القرية. وفي ما خلا ذلك، أنت مجرد قروي.
أنت الذئب الألفا⚡️؛ مصدر الكارثة. عضتك هي سبب تحويل البشر إلى ذئاب. كل ليلة، ستختار مهاجمة وقتل بشري، لكن طالما أنت حيّ فإن لدى ضحيتك فرصة بنسبة 20% للتحول إلى ذئب.

أنت جرو الذئب 🐶؛ يحبك قطيع الذئاب حتى الجنون. كبقية الذئاب، ستختار مهاجمة وقتل قرويٍ كل ليلة. إن صادف وتم قتلك، قطيع الذئاب خاصتك سيستشيطون غضبًا ويهاجموا شخصين في الليلة التالية. لكنك ستظل ميتًا على الرغم من ذلك.

As the sun starts to shine on the village, {0} wakes to the sound of silence. Realising there was no one left, {0} walks and walks, until they stand alone in the middle of the village. Looking at the sight of the corpses strewn all across the village, {0} sighs. Their lifelong dream of being chosen to be lynched by the villagers is as dead as the villagers are. They reach out and touch the rope, that had taken many lives, tenderly, before slipping it around their neck and letting themselves hang freely, with a sad smile on their face.

{0} wakes up at dawn, alone. {0} sees how abject a failure they has been, not being able to get the village to satisfy their masochistic desires of being lynched to death. {0} grabs a rope and hangs himself, realising no one can accomplish their dream, since there is no one left.

{0} opens their eyes, but instead of hearing the usual bustle of the village, they are met with silence. They stare at the dreary ceiling, letting reality slowly sink in. Everyone was dead. The wolves were dead. With a pang in their heart, {0} gets up, and packs their things, before walking to the edge of the village. A tear slips from their eye, as {0} recalls how close they and their wolves were to victory. Alas, it was time to start a new life, with a new pack. {0} slips into the darkness of the forest, away from the quiet village.

For all of {0}'s efforts, {0}'s wolf friends lay motionless and lifeless. Even if the wolves have been brought victory, there is no one to savour the success with, neither are there any living villagers to mock at. {0} peers into the crystal ball, and silently disappears, in a cloud of fog, in search of new wolves, new allies, and new treachery to commit new crimes against humanity.

As you opened the door to leave your house, a gust of wind blew towards you, causing you to freeze in your tracks 🐺☃️. You stand frozen in the doorway, silently cursing this weird form of bondage. Ah well, thank goodness you're thawed now.

As you stirred in your sleep, preparing to wake up to get your potions, a strong gust of wind blew in from the windows, causing you to freeze 🐺☃️. From the corner of your eyes, you saw the bottles of your potions frosted over. Looks like they didn't escape the brunt of the freezing spell either. You mentally sighed, wishing the sun came up sooner... Good thing you're thawed now, though

As you donned your cloak and prepared to leave your house, a gust of wind blew in from the doorway, causing you to freeze 🐺☃️. Your fellow cultists dropped by soon after to bring you along to cult people, but they ended up laughing at your demise. Leaving you by the doorway, they promised that they'll make good work of tonight. Now that you're unfrozen, you leave the house, cringing in embarrassment.
As you grabbed your sword, a gust of wind blew in from the window, causing you to freeze, back still arched 🐺☃️. You mentally groaned, your limbs aching from being in this position until now...

As you sat at your table, ready to use your psychic powers, a gust of wind blew in from the window, causing you to freeze 🐺☃️. While being bound usually isn't a problem, the freezing spell also gave you a serious case of brain freeze. You weren't worried though, knowing that the sun rising is one of the constants of this world and that you'll be thawed now.

As you willed your wings to appear, a gust of wind blew in from the windows, causing you to freeze 🐺☃️. You inwardly cringed as you suddenly imagine yourself as an ornament on a Christmas tree. Thankfully, this is now over since the sun has risen.

As you admired your liver collection one last time before leaving your house, a gust of wind blew in from the windows, frosting the glass jars... freezing you 🐺☃️. As you unfroze this morning, you gritted your teeth in annoyance at the Snow Wolf's spell, swearing to make them suffer as much as possible when you take their liver.

As you sulked around the village, you felt a strong gust of wind. You stood frozen in your tracks, literally unable to move 🐺☃️. You are the Grave Digger ☠️. Every night, you dig the graves for all the people who died since the last time you did (yes, even werewolves deserve a proper burial). Since you are out all night, wolves and the cult can't find you, unless you actually have nothing to do (i.e. no one died), in that case you'll just stay home. Everyone who visits you has a chance of falling into your newly dug graves, depending on how many graves you dug. Also, the chance is halved for everyone who is on the village team with you. But since you are out at night, the wolves or the serial killer might spot and kill you, and the more graves you have to dig, the more likely it is. Also, apparently the serial killer can find you whether you're at home or not, but they might at least stumble in one of your graves and hurt their leg, causing them to maybe lose control over who is their victim the next night...
